Keyboard shortcuts for Asana

A visual cheat-sheet for the 40 keyboard shortcuts found in Asana

Original Reference Report Issue

My Tasks

Mark as Today in your My Tasks

  • Tab
  • Y

Mark as Upcoming in your My Tasks

  • Tab
  • U

Mark as Later in your My Tasks

  • Tab
  • L

Inbox

Move Up/Down

  • K/J

Jump to Inbox tab

  • H

Jump to Archive tab

  • S

Follow or Unfollow

  • F

Archive

  • I

Move to Inbox

  • U

Task Actions

New Task

  • Enter

Delete Selected Task(s)

  • Tab
  • Backspace

Delete current task (when task name is empty)

  • Backspace

Complete Selected Task(s)

  • Ctrl
  • Enter

Move Up/Down

  • Ctrl
  • Up/Down

Jump Up/Down to the next Section

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Up/Down

Copy Selected Tasks

  • Ctrl
  • C

Paste Tasks (one per line)

  • Ctrl
  • V

Assign to Me

  • Tab
  • M

Like a Selected Task

  • Tab
  • H

Create a Section (at the end of a task name)

  • :

Navigation

Navigate to My Tasks

  • Tab
  • Z

Navigate to Inbox

  • Tab
  • I

Comment on Selected Task

  • Tab
  • C

Assign Selected Task

  • Tab
  • A

Set Due Date

  • Tab
  • D

Add Follower

  • Tab
  • F

Add a tag to the task

  • Tab
  • T

Focus Subtasks

  • Tab
  • S

Search for a project, tag, person, or task

  • Tab
  • /

Selection

Change Selection

  • Up/Down

Select Range

  • Shift
  • (click)

Select Range

  • Shift
  • Up/Down

Multi-select Individual Task

  • Ctrl
  • (click)

Application

Show Keyboard Shortcuts

  • Ctrl
  • /

Expand the right pane

  • Tab

Collapse the right pane

  • Esc

Enter Focus Mode

  • Tab
  • X

Quick Add

  • Tab
  • Q

Post Comment (from comment field)

  • Tab
  • Enter

What it sounds like

  • Tab
  • B
